gravity
Interface DynamicWeaver

public interface DynamicWeaver

Implementations of this interface will instrument objects dynamically at runtime. This is basically a hook to allow cross-cutting aspects to be weaved into components dynamically.

Version:
$Id: DynamicWeaver.html,v 1.1 2004-05-12 04:49:33 harishkswamy Exp $
Author:
Harish Krishnaswamy

Method Summary
 java.lang.Object weave(java.lang.Object obj)
          Takes an object, that needs instrumentation, and enhances it (typically based on some configuration).
 

Method Detail

weave

public java.lang.Object weave(java.lang.Object obj)
Takes an object, that needs instrumentation, and enhances it (typically based on some configuration).

This method will be called at the time of service construction right after instantiation.

Returns:
The instrumented object.
See Also:
ComponentBuilder.build(ComponentKey, Location, Class, Object[], Map, Location)
